moving

Class PotionJar

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.Item
      • moving.PotionJar

  • public class PotionJar
extends Item
    Stores and updates all information for a Potion Jar.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PotionJar

        public PotionJar(java.lang.String name,
         java.lang.String description,
         int xOnMap,
         int yOnMap,
         boolean isOnMap,
         java.awt.Image img,
         int type,
         int maxHealAmount,
         double cooldown)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item.
        description - The item's description.
        xOnMap - The x-location of the item on the map, if it is on the map.
        yOnMap - The y-location of the item on the map, if it is on the map.
        isOnMap - Whether the item is on the map or not.
        img - The Image of the item.
        type - The type of potion jar, i.e. health or energy.
        maxHealAmount - The maximum amount of potion this potion jar can hold.
        cooldown - The cooldown (i.e. how long you must wait before using this jar again). This prevents spamming of potions.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeal

        public int getHeal(int healthNeeded)
        Given an amount of health needed, gives as much health needed from this jar. If the amount needed exceeds the amount left in the jar, this jar gives back whatever it can, and empties itself. If the amount needed is less than the amount left in the jar, the potion jar gives exactly the amount needed, and keeps the remaining potion, and gets put on a cooldown.
        Parameters:
        healthNeeded - The amount of health needed by the player
        Returns:
        The amount of health given back to the player.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the cooldown of the potion jar.

      • getRatio

        public double getRatio()
        Fetches the ratio of this jar's current amount remaining to the max amount of potion it can hold.
        Returns:
        Ratio of current volume to the maximum amount the jar can hold.

      • export

        public java.lang.String export()
        Exports the PotionJar for use on exporting the map. It will also export the potion jar's remaining volume. This is only used when the jar is on the map.
        Overrides:
        export in class Item
        Returns:
        A String that represents the Potion Jar's data to export.
